summary: This Mod Changes Hroki and adds her as a trusty Companion.
descriptionHtml:
This Mod Changes Hroki and adds her as a trusty Companion who specializes in Destruction Magic. She has The Staff of Firebolts, The DB version of the Triss armor and so on...

Required Files:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168 - Apachii Sky Hair by apachii
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9198 - Witcher Ultimate Experience Mod by AlphaWoIF
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18113 - Shredded Triss Armor by esmm40
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037 - UFO Ultimate Follower Overhaul by fLokii (This mod is required because sometimes Hroki is in her default outfit so when you talk to her using UFO you tell her \'\'You Know\'\' first then \'\'You could dress better\'\' and she\'ll wear the Triss armor).

FAQ:

My CK is a little glitchy so I did everything in my power to fix the outfit bug ,if you can contact me ASAP.
author: LeonBlackgrave
